Class: LineSeries

insight. LineSeries

new insight.LineSeries(name, data, x, y)

The LineSeries class extends the Series class and draws horizontal bars on a Chart
Name Type Description
name string A uniquely identifying name for this chart
data DataSet The DataSet containing this series' data
x insight.Scales.Scale the x axis
y insight.Scales.Scale the y axis

Methods

#self.lineType(){String}

The line type that this lineSeries will draw. Defaults to 'linear'. See https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/SVG-Shapes#line_interpolate for all options.
Returns:
The line type that this lineSeries will draw.

#self.lineType(newLineType){this}

Sets the line type that this lineSeries will draw..
Name Type Description
newLineType String The line type that this lineSeries will draw.

#self.shouldShowPoints(){boolean}

Whether or not to show circular points on top of the line for each datapoint.
Returns:
Whether or not to show circular points on top of the line for each datapoint.

#self.shouldShowPoints(showPoints){this}

Sets whether or not to show circular points on top of the line for each datapoint.
Name Type Description
showPoints boolean Whether or not to show circular points on top of the line for each datapoint.
